Tucson looks to Talon and nods.

" That could very well be.  I have this st=
range feeling that someone else is in on it too..  The thing with Rodimus..=
.. I think Unicron isn't alone on that one.  It sounds more like something =
a quintesson would cook up.  Not sure of that but that's what it sounds lik=
e to me.   Hydras, can any of you track Quintesson IFF signals? I think we =
might have a few mulling around."

Perpetually on the move and constantly b=
usy.
